phase1.description: Add new tables without modifying existing ones

phase2.description: Migrate existing L2 data to new schema
steps: Copy data from existing features table to l2_features
Create optimized views for fast querying
Create materialized views for common queries
Add partitioning by date if needed

ofi_features.storage: store computed values, not raw deltas

integration_notes.model_training: Batch read historical features with timestamp filtering
integration_notes.real_time_prediction: Stream latest features from cache or DB
integration_notes.backtesting: Efficient time-range queries with proper indexing
integration_notes.monitoring: Track feature computation latency and storage growth

architecture_issues.issue: Database schema lacks support for new features
architecture_issues.impact: Cannot store enhanced features (OFI, pressure, stability)
Cannot track feature changes or A/B test
architecture_issues.fix: Add feature_metadata table and version tracking
Implement feature computation caching and batch processing
Implement data archival and cleanup policies

architecture_issues.impact: Cannot detect feature drift or computation errors
architecture_issues.fix: Add feature statistics tracking and alerting
